Hi my name is Elijah

I am a Biomedical Engineering Student, Learning Coach, and Indie Game Developer. My interdisciplinary skillset has allowed me to work as Instructional Designer for half a decade, were I have taught over a thousand students and led live workshops infront of 40+ people.

Skills: Copywriting; Marketing; Organizational skills; Teaching; Sales; Project Management; Outreach; Cirriculum Developement/Design; Microsoft Office.

Experiences

Regional Center, Los Angeles, 2022 — Present

Worked with students with ADHD, ADD, ASD, and numerous Anxiety disorders in clinical and in home environments. Collaborated with other healthcare providers as well as educators to design curriculums for these students. By developing more engaging and individualized curriculums, I increased student outcomes, as measured by GPA by up to 40%

Learning Coach, Los Angeles, 2023 — Present

At Koi I was Learning Coach and Instructional Designer some of the projects I've worked on include, "Section Leads", outreach workshops, and developing Cirriculums. My job had me curate feedback, adaptive, and custom, evidence based learning/organizational techniques. I specialized in coaching metacognitive skills like mindmaps, interleaving, and revision methodologies

My teams and I have improved Academic outcomes by upto 30% as measured by engagement with the students own content and CGPA.

Omearch, Los Angeles, 2024 — Present

Omearch is an Educational Consulting firm I founded. I was responsible for instructional design and product management, I led workshops, challenge events, and managed our mentorship program which was a team of 5 people including dental students, engineering students, and learning coaches in teaching over a dozen students.
